alterations.definition: Any alteration, improvement or addition to the Premises

requirements.details: Plans drawn and sealed by a licensed architect or space planner

requirements.consent_condition: Shall not be unreasonably withheld if compliant with law and lease provisions

contractor_requirements.approval: All contractors or workmen must be approved by Landlord
contractor_requirements.work_quality: Performed in a good and workmanlike manner
contractor_requirements.compliance: Must comply with all applicable codes, rules, regulations, and ordinances
contractor_requirements.licensing: All workers must be licensed tradesmen for their type of work

restoration.requirement: Tenant must restore Premises to original condition
restoration.deadline: By the date Tenant vacates or the Termination Date, whichever is earlier
restoration.exceptions: Landlord approved partitions or specified alterations

damage_repair.responsibility: Tenant must repair any damage caused by property installation or removal

alterations.additional_condition: Landlord may require execution of Design Construction Standards

acceptance_of_possession.condition: Upon taking possession, Tenant is deemed to have accepted the Premises and Building
acceptance_of_possession.acknowledgment: Tenant acknowledges the condition of the Premises and Building
